TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DisplayMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Represents a possible display mode for the ReportViewer control.
Docs.remarks:
<!CDATA[
## Remarks A **DisplayMode** enumerator value is passed to the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer.SetDisplayMode%2A> method of the ReportViewer control.
]>

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.DisplayMode Normal = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the control is in normal mode. This mode causes the control to display logical pages.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.DisplayMode PrintLayout = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the control is in print layout mode. In this mode, the control displays physical pages.
